name: Justin Roiland
info:
• 简体中文名: 贾斯汀·罗伊兰
  • 别名: Mark Justin Roiland
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1980-02-21
  • 引用来源: Wikipedia
  • 出生地: 美国·加利佛尼亚州·斯托克顿
  • Twitter: @JustinRoiland
detail: Mark Justin Roiland (born February 21, 1980) is an American actor, voice actor, animator, writer, producer, stand-up comedian, director and video game developer. He is best known as the co-creator and executive producer of the Adult Swim animated series Rick and Morty, in which he voices both of the show's eponymous characters, the voice of Oscar on the Disney Channel's animated television show Fish Hooks, as well as the Earl of Lemongrab on Cartoon Network's Adventure Time, and several characters (most notably Blendin Blandin) on Gravity Falls.
